entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
